history.proof: intros. sfirstorder use: Cmod_inv, Cmod_mult unfold: Rdiv, Cdiv.

original: intros. intros h. unfold Cmod. rewrite RtoC_div. rewrite sqrt_mult. rewrite RtoC_minus. rewrite RtoC_mult. rewrite Cmod_R. rewrite Rabs_mult. rewrite <- Cmod_norm. rewrite Cmult_plus_distr_r. apply Rdiv_plus. - apply Cmod_gt_0. apply h. - apply Cmod_gt_0. apply h.
